item.title: Work Experience
item.description: I’ve worked in a swath of different business sectors, ranging from startups to enterprises, from direct-to-consumer to B2B. My programming languages have been primarily Javascript (client & server) and more recently, Typescript, with smatterings of Golang and Python thrown in there.
